title: Help
body: So i downloaded the pbe thingy patcher.And i really dont know how to sign up to that or do i need to login from my real account . Im EUNE please help.

replies.body: While it's possible for anyone to download the PBE client, you will need a PBE account to sign in.  You can sign up for the PBE through an [application](https://pbesignup.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  We can't guarantee or expedite applications, but details on how they are selected can be found in our [PBE FAQ](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  Good luck with your application!
